entry.title: 1ãƒ¯ã‚¤ãƒ‰æ–‡å­—ã«åã¾ã‚‰ãªã„ãƒ¯ã‚¤ãƒ‰æ–‡å­—ãƒªãƒ†ãƒ©ãƒ«ã‚’ç¦æ­¢ã™ã‚‹ [P2362R3] -- Update remove_non_encodable_wide_character_literals_and_multicharacter_wide_character_literals.md

 - ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å¯èƒ½ã§ã¯ãªã„ã€ã¾ãŸã¯è¤‡æ•°æ–‡å­—ã‚’å«ã‚€æ–‡å­—
 
 ```cpp
-wchar_t a = 'ğŸ¤¦'; // C++20:OK, C++23:OK \U0001f926
-wchar_t b = 'ab'; // C++20:OK, C++23:NG ãƒãƒ«ãƒã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ†ãƒ©ãƒ«
-wchar_t c = 'eÌÌ';  // C++20:OK, C++23:NG \u0065\u0301

+wchar_t b = L'ab'; // C++20:OK, C++23:NG ãƒãƒ«ãƒã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ†ãƒ©ãƒ«
+wchar_t c = L'eÌÌ';  // C++20:OK, C++23:NG \u0065\u0301
 ```
 
 `wchar_t`ã¯ãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦16ãƒ“ãƒƒãƒˆã‹32ãƒ“ãƒƒãƒˆã®ã©ã¡ã‚‰ã‹ã¨ãªã‚‹ã€‚
@@ -31,4 +31,4 @@ wchar_t c = 'eÌÌ';  // C++20:OK, C++23:NG \u0065\u0301
 
 
 ## å‚ç…§

entry.title: apply_givens_rotation -- linalg : apply_givens_rotationã«ä¾‹ã‚’è¿½åŠ (#1233)
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/linalg/apply_givens_rotation.md b/reference/linalg/apply_givens_rotation.md
index 1e8d4ed20..409f6a594 100644
--- a/reference/linalg/apply_givens_rotation.md
+++ b/reference/linalg/apply_givens_rotation.md
@@ -98,9 +98,107 @@ $$
 
 
 ## ä¾‹
+**[æ³¨æ„] å‡¦ç†ç³»ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ‘ã‚¤ãƒ©ã§ç¢ºèªã—ã¦ã„ãªã„ãŸã‚ã€é–“é•ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚**
+
+```cpp example
+#include <cmath>
+#include <complex>
+#include <initializer_list>
+#include <execution>
+#include <iostream>
+#include <linalg>
+#include <mdspan>
+#include <vector>
+
+template <class Vector>
+void print(Vector v) {
+  for (int i = 0; i < v.extent(0) - 1; ++i) {
+    std::cout << v[i] << ", ";
+  }
+  std::cout << v[v.extent(0) - 1] << std::endl;
+}
+
+int main()
+{
+  constexpr size_t N = 2;
+
+  using Complex = std::complex<double>;
+
+  {
+    std::initializer_list<double> a_coeff = {1, std::sqrt(3.0)};
+    std::initializer_list<double> b_coeff = {std::sqrt(3.0), -0.5};
+
+    std::vector<double> a_vec(a_coeff);
+    std::mdspan a(a_vec.data(), N);
+
+    std::vector<double> b_vec(b_coeff);
+    std::mdspan b(b_vec.data(), N);
+
+    double c = 0.5;
+    double s = -std::sqrt(3.0) / 2;
+
+    // (1)
+    std::linalg::apply_givens_rotation(a, b, c, s);
+    print(a);
+    print(b);
+
+    // (2)
+    // aã¨bã‚’åˆæœŸåŒ–
+    a_vec = a_coeff;
+    b_vec = b_coeff;
+    std::linalg::apply_givens_rotation(std::execution::par, a, b, c, s);
+    print(a);
+    print(b);
+  }
+
+  {
+    std::initializer_list<Complex> a_coeff = {Complex{1, 0}, Complex{std::sqrt(3.0), 0}};
+    std::initializer_list<Complex> b_coeff = {Complex{0, std::sqrt(3.0)}, Complex{0, -0.5}};
+
+    std::vector<Complex> a_vec(a_coeff);
+    std::mdspan a(a_vec.data(), N);
+
+    std::vector<Complex> b_vec(b_coeff);
+    std::mdspan b(b_vec.data(), N);
+
+    double  c = 0.5;
+    Complex s = Complex{0, -std::sqrt(3.0) / 2};
+
+    // (3)
+    std::linalg::apply_givens_rotation(a, b, c, s);
+    print(a);
+    print(b);
+
+    // (4)
+    // aã¨bã‚’åˆæœŸåŒ–
+    a_vec = a_coeff;
+    b_vec = b_coeff;
+    std::linalg::apply_givens_rotation(std::execution::par, a, b, c, s);
+    print(a);
+    print(b);
+  }
+
+  return 0;
+}
+```
+* std::linalg::apply_givens_rotation[color ff0000]
 
 
 ### å‡ºåŠ›
+```
+(1)
+1, 0
+0, -1
+(2)
+1, 0
+0, -1
+(3)
+(1,0), (0,0)
+(0,0), (0,-1)
+(4)
+(1,0), (0,0)
+(0,0), (0,-1)
+```
 
 
 ## ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³
